product_name: Sunlite Air Surge Frame Mini Pump - 2013 Overstock
long_description: A reliable mini pump at a great price, the Sunlite Air Surge Frame Mini Pump works with both Presta and Schrader valves and inflates tires to 100 psi. Oversize alloy barrel offers a high volume for fewer overall pumps. The Sunlite Air Surge Frame Mini Pump includes mounting bracket and dust cap. Telescoping, locking T-handle. Overstock.
short_description: A reliable mini pump at a great price, the Sunlite Air Surge Frame Mini Pump works with both Presta and Schrader valves and inflates tires to 100 psi.
